title: 相同模组客户端可以正常启动，是什么原因导致服务端崩溃
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤显示]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.9.jar)

  llibrary (llibrary-core-1.0.11-1.12.2.jar)
  CXLibraryCore ([前置]cxlibrary-1.12.1-1.6.1.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// On the bright side, I bought you a teddy bear!

Time: 20-8-15 下午3:40
Description: Exception in server tick loop

Missing Mods:
        unknown : need [1.4.8,): have missing

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.MissingModsException: Mod topaddons (TOP Addons) requires [theoneprobe@[1.4.8,)]

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... d=717654&page=1
安装此模组的1.4.8或更高的版本

名副其实 发表于 2020-8-15 15:46
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=717654&page=1
安装此模组的1.4.8或更高的版本 ...
已添加还是崩溃，以下是崩溃报告
